revised_title: Effects of Papaver Corniculatum Luteum: A Case Study
tldr: The author documents a case study where consuming a pie made from the roots of Papaver Corniculatum Luteum, or Horned Poppy, caused delirium and hallucinations in a family. The subjects believed everything they saw was gold due to the yellow color of the plant's flowers. The effects were temporary and resolved after a few days.
